sentences.sentence: Their costly and futile attempt to subjugate the Afghans lasted just 10 years.
sentences.translation: 他们想征服阿富汗人的意图耗费大量金钱而且无效，只维持了十年的时间。

sentences.sentence: As one ceases to subjugate themselves, they will cease to be subordinate.
sentences.translation: 当人们结束让自己屈从，他们将结束成为下属。

sentences.sentence: They are willing to subjugate their own feelings for the good of the group.
sentences.translation: 为了团体的利益，他们愿意克制自己的个人情感。
